title: Riot...Client Problems?
body: I'm sure everyone has had this issue and it's no fun at all.

replies.body: I just play other games while the client is updating, it takes a long time and it usually gets stuck at 33% or 99% but just wait it out and eventually it would start

afaik the current client will calculate differences until it finds a corrupt file, then it will start from the beginning again until it hits another corrupt file.

Rinse, repeat.

This may take some time, please allow it to run to completion though.

Yea it is an occurring problem. But just let it do it's thing. Leave it for 30 minutes and it comes right
Came right for me :)
It went over 30k "Scanning Files" and I let it run for more then 30 mins
I honestly thought you meant the ryze release XD

I don't think the 33% issue is a bug, I've had it many times, but it has always been when my network is slow. If it is a bug, then it's annoying but I usually just restart my client a couple of times and it starts to progress.
I'm talking about the file scanning, it just keeps going. Literally there are old threads complaining about this.
I know, it keeps scanning unlimited files stuck on 33% or stuck on step 1.
